title.rendered: Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey Community Non-Account Based Sharing

content.rendered:
AutomationHour 5Sharing Managed by Community Users
August 28, 2020 – Virtual


Webinar Overview

The Use Case
Have sharing based around a custom object rather than an account so that users from completely unrelated accounts can do a  request for access within the community and an external admin can manage visibility to the parent and child records.This was done with a flow and lwc component, with all sharing was declarative


Deck



View Deck

YouTube Video
https://youtu.be/zLgIQbncBLA

excerpt.rendered: Meighan Brodkey presents a great session on Rollup Summary Fields with Lookups. Meighan takes the standard “Rollup” mentality to the next level with dynamic rollups based on what type of record is connected to the record. An awesome scenario that can show you how to take your automation to the next level! Also, lots of great questions so plenty for everyone of all skills to learn from.
